topComments.author: David Butler
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um tesouro escondido de Liverpool, NY belas vistas do lago e ar fresco durante todo o ano. Separar pedestres e rodas: patins, pranchas, trilhas de bicicletas s√£o fornecidas. Este √© um √≥timo lugar para come√ßar seus passos e um senso de comunidade.  (Original) A hidden treasure of Liverpool, NY beautiful lake views nd fresh air all year long.  Separate pedestrian and wheeled: skates, boards,bikes trails are provided. This is a great place to get your steps  in and a sense of community.

topComments.author: Heath Fedor
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um √≥timo lugar para visitar. Pessoas de todos os lugares fazendo qualquer coisa sob o sol. Jogue campos, esportes, restaurantes e um √≥timo lugar para caminhar, correr ou simplesmente sair e ser social!  (Original) A great place to visit. People from everywhere doing anything under the sun. Play grounds, sports,  resturants and a great place to walk, run, or just get out and be social!

topComments.author: Jason Persaud
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque encantador com excelentes vistas do lago. Amplo estacionamento com toneladas de vagas. Pode haver uma taxa de entrada durante a alta temporada (US $ 8 ou mais), mas n√£o havia nenhuma taxa quando visitei l√° no final de setembro. Notei que algumas pessoas pescam l√°, mas n√£o tenho certeza dos requisitos da licen√ßa. H√° tamb√©m uma grande √°rea de recrea√ß√£o infantil bem cuidada. O parque tamb√©m possui uma pista de skate, quadra de shuffleboard, quadra de bocha e quadra de v√¥lei. Se voc√™ caminhar mais para o norte ao longo da margem do lago, ver√° uma marina l√°. Muitas trilhas e caminhos para caminhar, correr, correr ou andar de bicicleta. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode alugar bicicletas, patins e quadriciclos l√°. Adoraria voltar quando as folhas mudassem de cor mais tarde, no outono ...  (Original) Lovely park offering some great views of the lake. Large parking lot with tons of spaces. There may be an entrance fee during the peak season ($8 or so) but there was no fee when I visited there in late September. I noticed some people fishing there, but I am not sure of the permit requirements. There is a large ane well-kept children play area there as well. The park also features a skate park, shuffleboard court, bocce ball court and volleyball court. If you walk further north along the lakeside, there is a marina there. Lots of trails and paths for walking, jogging, running or biking. You can also rent bikes, skates and quad-bikes there as well. I would love to return when the leaves change colors later on in the fall...

topComments.author: J Mathurin
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque agrad√°vel com trilha de caminhada na margem do Lago Onondaga. O parque tem um parquinho infantil, pista de skate e alguns pares de pesca. A trilha de caminhada √© muito curta para o tamanho geral dos lagos. O parque seria melhor com trilhas de caminhada mais longas.  (Original) Nice park with a walking trail on the shore of Onondaga Lake. The park has a children's playground, skatepark & a couple fishing peers. The walking trail is very short for the lakes overall size. The park would be better with longer walking trails.

topComments.author: Megedas Julien
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ahhh que lindo üòç Estava muito frio quando fui, sou da Fl√≥rida, n√£o aguentei tanto tempo no frio. Planing to go back this weekend to get more pictures.

topComments.author: Silvana Mero
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O que √© um grande parque lindo !! agrad√°vel para piqueniques e apenas relaxar debaixo de uma √°rvore. Atmosfera pac√≠fica junto √† √°gua. Gosto de ver os barcos navegando e meditando e refletindo sobre a vida aqui üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®  (Original) What a beautiful large park!! nice for picnics and just relaxing under a tree. Peaceful atmosphere by the water. I enjoy watching the boats sail by and meditate and reflect on life here üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚ú®

topComments.author: The Eclectic Life
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um excelente tempo aqui. O tempo estava bom e as pessoas pareciam genuinamente felizes. O caminho pavimentado que circunda o lago √© √≥timo e f√°cil de caminhar. As pessoas andavam de bicicleta e patins. Havia muitos bancos de parque onde voc√™ poderia fazer uma pausa e apenas olhar para o lago. Havia mesas de piquenique perto da √°rea do viaduto, onde muitas pessoas se reuniam para almo√ßar. Este lugar tinha apenas uma vibra√ß√£o; foi t√£o calmante e nost√°lgico para mim. Eu n√£o posso recomendar este lugar o suficiente, se voc√™ est√° vindo aqui para fazer algum exerc√≠cio ou apenas para ter um bom dia lendo um livro em um banco. O estacionamento tamb√©m era gratuito, o que √© uma grande vantagem.  (Original) We had an excellent time here. The weather was nice and people seemed genuinely happy. The paved path that goes around the lake is great and easy to walk on. People were riding bikes and rollerblading. There were lots of park benches where you could take a break and just gaze at the lake. There were picnic tables near the overpass area where lots of people were getting together for lunch. This place just had a vibe; it was so calming and nostalgic for me. I cannot recommend this place enough, whether you're coming here to get some exercise or just to have a nice day reading a book on a bench. Parking was also free, so that is a big plus.

topComments.author: Joe Capalbo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© o meu parque favorito em Syracuse, estou aqui o tempo todo. Todo mundo √© muito legal. Se eu tivesse uma reclama√ß√£o, diria que deveria adicionar algumas latas de lixo ao longo do caminho de caminhada  (Original) This is my favorite park in Syracuse, I here all the time. Everyone is very nice. If I had one complain I would say the should add a few trash cans along the walking path

topComments.author: Chevy Halfton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â bom ter o parque do que n√£o, mas toda vez que estou l√°, vejo o potencial de algo muito mais para a comunidade. Espero que eles avancem com planos de maior acesso √† √°gua da costa. Incorpore mais √°reas de estar junto √† √°gua. Crie mais restaurantes e √°reas de encontro, bem como atividades voltadas para a fam√≠lia. Seria incr√≠vel ter acesso caminh√°vel direto √†s instala√ß√µes nativas americanas tamb√©m.  (Original) Nice to have the park than not, but every time I‚Äôm there, I see the potential of something much more for the community.  Hopefully they will go through with plans of greater access to the water from shore.  Incorporate more seating gathering areas by the water.  Create more eateries and gathering areas, as a well as family focused activities.  Would be awesome to have direct walkable access to the Native American facility as well.

topComments.author: Daniela Fernandez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um lugar t√£o agrad√°vel para fazer caminhadas! Muito bonito  (Original) Such a nice place to go on walks! Very pretty

topComments.author: Amanda Blake
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As crian√ßas e eu adoramos vir aqui quando podemos! Costumamos trazer um piquenique, brincar no parquinho, andar de bicicleta ou alugar no parque e SEMPRE passamos um tempinho no skate park. Estamos l√° de 3 a 5 horas normalmente e nunca ficamos sem coisas para fazer. O parque √© limpo, tem banheiros p√∫blicos e uma √°rea de lanches, n√£o se preocupe que as pessoas roubem suas coisas se voc√™ deixar no ch√£o para ir ao parquinho, e apenas uma das √°reas mais bonitas de Siracusa para crian√ßas e adultos.  (Original) The kids and I love coming here when we can! We usually bring a picnic lunch, play on the playground, ride our bikes or rent them from the park and we ALWAYS spend a little time at the skate park. We are there from 3 to 5 hours usually and never run out of things to do. The park is clean, has public restrooms and a snack area, no worries of people stealing your stuff if you leave it on the ground to go out to the playground, and just one of the nicest areas around Syracuse for kids and adults.

topComments.author: Lisa Matkowski
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lindo lago! Caminhamos um pouco da trilha, mas n√£o foi um dia agrad√°vel.  (Original) Pretty lake!  We Walked some of the trail, but not a nice day.

topComments.author: Tammy Clark
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Adoro ter meu barco na Marina. √â t√£o bonito. Ansioso para muitos momentos divertidos neste ver√£o.  (Original) Love having my boat at the Marina. It is so beautiful. Looking forward to many fun times this summer.

topComments.author: Ben Jacik
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um lugar calmo e tranquilo para apenas descontrair e relaxar. Vi pessoas passeando com seus cachorros, vi pessoas correndo, correndo ou apenas dando um passeio. Minha esposa e eu somos deficientes f√≠sicos, ent√£o paramos o carro o mais pr√≥ximo poss√≠vel do lago, abaixamos as janelas para aproveitar o ar fresco e apenas relaxamos por cerca de meia hora.  (Original) A quiet and peaceful place to just unwind and relax. Saw people walking their dogs, saw people running, jogging, or just taking a walk.  Both my wife and I are disabled, so we pull the car up as close as we could to the lake, roll the windows down to enjoy the fresh air and just relax for about a half an hour.

topComments.author: Chan Komagan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo parque para passear e apreciar o p√¥r do sol. Limpo e sereno.  (Original) Great park to walk around and enjoy the sunset. Clean and serene.

topComments.author: Joshua Johnson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Excelente lugar para relaxar, estudar, caminhar, correr, andar de bicicleta, etc. A trilha de caminhada se estende por mais de 3 milhas, com popula√ß√£o m√≠nima ou moderada em um dia normal. √Årea limpa, paisagem deslumbrante. Playground para crian√ßas, al√©m de pista de skate. 5 estrelas  (Original) Excellent place to relax, study, go on a walk, run, bike, etc. The walking trail extends some odd 3+ miles, minimally to moderately populated on an average day. Clean area, gorgeous scenery. Playground for kiddos, as well as a skate park. 5 stars

topComments.author: Danielle Lochren
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Belo parque, mas √© enorme e f√°cil de se perder. O lago √© lindo, mas voc√™ n√£o quer nadar nele. √â um dos lagos mais polu√≠dos do estado. Embora eles estejam tentando limpar o lago h√° anos.  (Original) Beautiful park but it is huge and easy to get lost. The lake is beautiful but you don't want to swim in it. It is one of the most polluted lakes in the state. Although they have been trying to clean thar lake for years.

topComments.author: Dark Seraphim
topComments.comment: Great local park around the historically and culturally important Lake Onondaga.  Beautiful in the spring, summer and fall.  Wonderful place for families and children and also a great place to exercise, just avoid the Canadian Geese.  Located next to many great local restaurants in Liverpool you can definitely relax for a few hours here.  Definitely recommend.

topComments.author: J Jeon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Excelente local para correr ou passear. Andar ao longo do lindo lago me deixa feliz :)  (Original) Excellent place to jog or to take a walk. Walking along the beautiful lake makes me happy:)
